trans-unit.source: At any time after provisioning a MongoLab database, you can access the MongoLab web UI for managing that database.
trans-unit.target: At any time after provisioning a MongoLab database, you can access the MongoLab web UI for managing that database.

trans-unit.source: We offer convenient single-sign-on (SSO) access through the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: We offer convenient single-sign-on (SSO) access through the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: You can use the MongoLab UI to perform most database tasks, such as inserting and querying for documents, obtaining database statistics, and running useful database commands.
trans-unit.target: You can use the MongoLab UI to perform most database tasks, such as inserting and querying for documents, obtaining database statistics, and running useful database commands.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the MongoLab UI, visit our [support page](http://support.mongolab.com) and our [blog](http://blog.mongolab.com).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about the MongoLab UI, visit our [support page](http://support.mongolab.com) and our [blog](http://blog.mongolab.com).

trans-unit.source: To access the MongoLab UI, do the following:
trans-unit.target: To access the MongoLab UI, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Locate your MongoLab service in your list of add-ons.
trans-unit.target: Locate your MongoLab service in your list of add-ons.

trans-unit.source: Cick the name of your add-on to reach the add-on page.
trans-unit.target: Cick the name of your add-on to reach the add-on page.

trans-unit.source: A new browser tab opens, displaying the MongoLab database home page:
trans-unit.target: A new browser tab opens, displaying the MongoLab database home page:

trans-unit.source: From here you can select a specific collection and drill down to individual documents.
trans-unit.target: From here you can select a specific collection and drill down to individual documents.

trans-unit.source: Log out when you are finished.
trans-unit.target: Log out when you are finished.
